group_1.textRight: We won by a landslide!
Well, it's only natural! See what happens@when the amazing Ria Ami is on your side?

group_1.textLeft: Mayu did an excellent job as support and it@made it easier for me to fight.
Thank you very much!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, well...that's all thanks to Ria's well@executed guidance.

group_1.textRight: P-precisely! You followed my instructions@perfectly, Mayu.
[chara:101300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa! Watch out! Something fell!

group_1.textLeft: Oh! It's "The Complete History of Swords"!@That's the book stolen from Sayuki.

group_1.textRight: So this is Sayuki's... [chara:101300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101300:cheek_0][chara:101300:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101300:lipSynch_1]Nngh! It's heavier@than it looks!

group_1.textLeft: It was specifically made to weigh around@three pounds, the weight of a sword.

group_1.textRight: What? That seems like unnecessary attention@to detail.

[chara:301000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?! Everything looks yellow all of a@sudden! [chara:301000:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301000:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:301000:lipSynch_1]With red spots?! What is this?!
Ugh, ew! Something got in my mouth...[chara:301000:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301000:cheek_0][chara:301000:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301000:lipSynch_1]@Oh, it tastes good.

group_1.textLeft: Ria, you're covered in rice omelet!

group_1.textRight: What?! A rice omelet?! Why did it have@to fall right on top of me?!

group_1.textLeft: It seems the Witch was the one who stole@the rice omelet as well!
L-look at all these stolen things!

group_1.textRight: *Gasp* Where are my clippings?!

group_1.textLeft: And my book of secrets!

group_1.textRight: We better grab as many of the stolen items@as we can before the Labyrinth disappears!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, okay!

group_1.textRight: Why? Whyyy? [chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]*Munch* *Munch*

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* Why indeed? [chara:101301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101301:eyeClose_1][chara:101301:lipSynch_1]*Chew* *Chew*

group_1.textRight: I'm finally back.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Mayu! We already started eating.

group_1.textRight: Oh, that's fine. It's better to eat while@it's hot.

group_1.textLeft: So did you *munch* return the book?@[chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]*Munch*

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.textCenter: I didn't think I'd get it back so soon!
[chara:303301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm so touched! Thank you! I definitely@owe you one!

group_1.textRight: Sayuki was really happy.

group_1.textLeft: That's good to hear!
We turned in the other stolen goods to the@police as well.
All of them were very valuable, so everyone@was really happy, weren't they?

group_1.textRight: Yes, they were... How wonderful...

group_1.textLeft: What are you sulking about?

group_1.textRight: Because...the item that was stolen from@me...
And the book of secrets...
And the museum's postcard...
They're all still missing, so forgive me@for wanting to sulk!

group_1.narration: That's right.@We defeated the Witch, but...
The items that were stolen from us@were still nowhere to be found.

group_1.textRight: Well, if I don't get it back, I guess that's@fine too.
If it disappeared with the Labyrinth, it'll@be gone for good. If that's the case...

group_1.textLeft: Are you talking to yourself again?

group_1.textRight: What?! No, I'm not!
Anyway, I need seconds please!

group_1.textLeft: I thought you'd say that, so I made more.@Here you go.

group_1.textRight: That's awfully thoughtful of you.

group_1.textLeft: There's some for you too, Mayu. I figured@you'd be getting here soon.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you very much. Wow! This looks@delicious!

group_1.textLeft: Of course it is. I made it myself!

group_1.textRight: *Munch* *Munch* [chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:motion_400][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]More please!

group_1.textLeft: I know my food tastes amazing, but aren't@you eating a little too much?

group_1.textRight: This is all-you-can-eat, is it not?
To make up for you accusing me of being a@thief.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300902:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Oof... I do feel bad about that.
I'm sorry, Ria.

group_1.textRight: It's fine. That's all in the past now.

group_1.textLeft: That being said, consider this a warning@from a well-meaning friend.
If you overeat, you'll get fat.

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-what? Fat?! How dare you utter that@word in my presence!

group_1.textLeft: Anyone would get fat if they overeat.

group_1.textRight: Wha?! I! What?!
But...I don't think it's bad to eat a lot.

group_1.textLeft: Y-you don't?

group_1.textRight: Yes! I can't eat very much, so I'm jealous.

group_1.textLeft: Absolutely right! So bring me more food!
Whoa, you're good at talking people up. All@the guys must be all over you, Mayu.

group_1.textRight: Really? What for?

group_1.textLeft: Hah... Stop kidding around.
*Sigh* What should I do?

group_1.textRight: If it hasn't disappeared with the Labyrinth,@then there's still hope.
Right, maybe it's just hidden somewhere else.

group_1.textLeft: That must be it!
We couldn't find it inside because it was@hidden in a different location!
Let's go look for it!

group_1.textRight: But where?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, um...[chara:101301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101301:motion_300][chara:101301:lipSynch_1] I don't know.
If you're gonna search random places, it@might be best to wait until tomorrow.
It's too late for students to be wandering@around.
B-but!

group_1.textRight: I should actually go home before my mother@starts to worry.

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Yeah, we shouldn't worry our families.

group_1.textRight: Luckily, we don't have school tomorrow.@Let's put off searching until then.

group_1.textLeft: Okay...

group_1.narration: At the time, we had no idea@what was waiting for us the next day...
